meanings.definition: Showing or requiring excessive attention to detail
meanings.sent1: She is the finickiest student in the class, always double-checking her work for any mistakes.
meanings.sent2: The finickiest eater at the table meticulously picked out every single vegetable from their meal.
meanings.sent3: The finickiest cat in the house refused to drink water unless it was poured into a crystal bowl.
meanings.sent4: His finickiest taste in music led him to spend hours curating the perfect playlist for every mood.
meanings.sent5: The finickiest tailor in town was known for creating flawless garments with impeccable stitching.

meanings.sent1: My sister is the finickiest when it comes to choosing the right color for her room.
meanings.sent2: The finickiest customer at the store spent hours comparing different brands before making a purchase.
meanings.sent3: The finickiest dog in the park would only play fetch with a specific red ball.
meanings.sent4: Her finickiest behavior towards her belongings made her room look like a perfectly organized museum.
meanings.sent5: The finickiest chef in the kitchen insisted on using only the freshest ingredients for every dish.

meanings.sent1: The finickiest decorator in the office spent days deciding on the perfect shade of blue for the walls.
meanings.sent2: Being the finickiest planner in the group, she made sure every minute of the trip was scheduled.
meanings.sent3: The finickiest gardener in the neighborhood would spend hours rearranging flowers for the perfect look.
meanings.sent4: His finickiest approach to organizing his desk led to a system where every pen had its place.
meanings.sent5: The finickiest student in the class always had the neatest and most detailed notes.
